section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by temporary legislation that will expire on June 2, 2021.*
section.heading: Maintenance of documents.
section.text: Copies of the specimen bonds and of the final Financing Documents and Closing Documents shall be filed in the Office of the Secretary of the District of Columbia.

codify:insert.text: *NOTE: This section was created by temporary legislation that will expire on June 2, 2021.*

annotations.annotation: For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 13 of Reunion Square Tax Increment Financing Temporary Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Law 23-146, Oct. 20, 2020, 67 DCR 9941).
